title: Elegant Kundan Polki Long Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents
materials: Base metal with Gold Plating. High-quality Kundan Polki stones
and Rubies (రత్నాలు). Features faux pearls (ముత్యాలు). Expert craftsmanship with Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This stunning long haaram features a classic design with alternating floral and circular motifs, each intricately embedded with sparkling Kundan Polki stones. Genuine-look emeralds and rubies are strategically placed to add pops of color and enhance the overall grandeur. The centerpiece is a larger pendant with floral details, a ruby center stone, and cascading emerald and ruby accents. The Kundan work is of superior quality, ensuring a brilliant sparkle.
occasions: and other special occasions. This haaram will add a touch of elegance to bridal looks (పెళ్లికూతురు) and traditional attire. Suitable for Seemantham (సీమంతం)
description: A timeless piece with traditional South Indian design, crafted with high-quality materials. The Kundan Polki setting provides unmatched brilliance and sparkle. This haaram is a statement piece that will be treasured for generations. Its intricate design and gemstone accents make it a perfect blend of tradition and elegance, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
